#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <cmath>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
#define mod 1000000007

int K,N;
ll arr[1001];

bool find(ll n){
    ll count=0;
    for(int i=0;i<K;i++){
        count += (ll)(n/arr[i]);
        if(count>=N)
            return true;
    }
    return false;
}

int main(){
    #ifdef DEBUG
    freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
    #endif // DEBUG

    scanf("%d %d", &K, &N);
    memset(arr, 0, sizeof(arr));
    for(int i=0;i<K;i++)
        scanf("%lld", &arr[i]);
    sort(arr, arr+K);
    ll low=0, high=arr[0]*(ll)N;
    while(low<high){
        ll mid = (low+high)/2;
        if(!find(mid))
            low = mid+1;
        else
            high = mid;
    }
    printf("%lld", low);

    return 0;
}
